page.title: 03IMPORTANT EVENTS IN BRIDGEND
page.content: { G.W.R.150}celebrations are being held this year.A Class 56 locomotive was named{"Castell Ogwr"}in a ceremony held at Bridgend Station.These locomotives are often seen locally, moving heavy freight trains. Castell Ogwr made its first journey carrying visitors along a local freight line to a remote signal box near the village of{Cefn Cribwr.}This signal box has been leased to the village society and converted for use as a natural history and historical studies centre. The local{police force}has developed a system of marking valuables with a special pen.Each item has the owner's postcode printed.The information is clearly visible when viewed under a source of ultra-violet light.
